title: Inside the secret celebrity life of Love Island intruder Biannca Rose
text:
After arriving on Love Island as an intruder on Tuesday night, many fans of the show may have thought Biannca Rose looked familiar.

It turns out this isn't the 25-year-old's first brush with reality TV fame, having appeared on Channel Seven's First Dates back in 2016.

But while she's gone off in search of love twice on reality TV, Biannca momentarily found it in the real world, dating 5 Seconds of Summer's Ashton Irwin.

Repeat act: After arriving on Love Island as an intruder on Tuesday night, many fans of the show may have thought Biannca Rose looked familiar

Biannca enjoyed a short-lived relationship with the 25-year-old drummer back in 2013.

'I was in a relationship with Ashton... but not anymore,' she tweeted shortly after their break up.

'That's all anyone needs to know. No need to pick sides I understand you're his fans, but please respect both our private lives now and move on...'

Getting real: It turns out this isn't the 25-year-old's first brush with reality TV fame, having appeared on Channel Seven's First Dates back in 2016

With the band: While she's gone off in search of love twice on reality TV, Biannca momentarily found it in the real world, dating 5 Seconds of Summer's Ashton Irwin

Following their seemingly contentious split, Biannca tried her luck at love again, this time on First Dates.

Biannca was paired with Will, and while their date seemed to have been a hit at the time, evidently, their relationship didn't work out.

After their first encounter, British Will exclaimed: 'Hopefully we'll have a wet p**sy at one point.'

Summer fling: Biannca enjoyed a short-lived relationship with the 25-year-old drummer back in 2013 (pictured together at back)

Over: 'I was in a relationship with Ashton... but not anymore,' she tweeted shortly after their break up

Loving herselfie: Following their seemingly contentious split, Biannca tried her luck at love again, this time on First Dates

Feeling rather confident, he then suggested they go for oysters, 'as they are an aphrodisiac', prompting Bianca to laugh and happily oblige.

With plenty of eye contact and sexual innuendos, it was clear that the two were lusting over one another during their dinner date.

But after entering the Love Island villa, Biannca made a beeline for Gerard Majda, 23, with the two appearing to hit it off.
description: After arriving on Love Island as an intruder on Tuesday night, many fans of the show may have thought Biannca Rose looked familiar. It turns out this isn't the 25-year-old's first brush with TV fame.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
